summary: This document is an arrest warrant issued for Jeffrey Epstein by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. It commands law enforcement to arrest Epstein based on charges related to sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors under specific sections of the United States Code.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual accused of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors as detailed in the warrant.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Alison Moe is the Assistant United States Attorney associated with the case, as indicated in the document.

persons.name: Barbara Moses
persons.context: Barbara Moses is the U.S. Magistrate Judge who signed the arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Alison Moe is the prosecutor handling the case against Jeffrey Epstein.
Barbara Moses is the judge who issued the arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Issuance of Arrest Warrant
events.description: An arrest warrant was issued for Jeffrey Epstein for charges related to sex trafficking.

keyFacts: The arrest warrant was issued for Jeffrey Epstein on charges of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.
The warrant was signed by U.S. Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses.
Alison Moe is the Assistant United States Attorney associated with this case.
